title: #AskGaryVee 245 | Growing a Cookie Business,  Facebook Ads for Car Sales & Betting Against the Market
description: Another episode of the call-in showwwwwww and we go live on ALL platforms ... YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, and Periscope. On this episode of #AskGaryVee I talk about trying out different career paths, going all-in on monetizing your passion-based business, and the danger of predicting things without actually acting on them. Let's -get into - the ....
